name: liu_hirche_cheng_2025
source: Liu-Hirche-Cheng (2025): Layer Cake Representations for Quantum Divergences, arXiv:2507.07065v2. Independent derivation of the two-term Frenkel formula (FR) and generalisations. Confirms D(rho||sigma) = integral_1^infty [E_gamma(rho||sigma)/gamma + E_gamma(sigma||rho)/gamma^2] dgamma.
